      salePrice - the sale price of the crop
      dailyGrowthRate - the daily growth rate of the crop

    • tendCrop

      public void tendCrop​(int instantGrowthAmount, int permGrowth)
      Changes crops current growth and daily growth rate. Then checkReadyToHarvest
      Parameters:
      instantGrowthAmount - the amount to increase current growth
      permGrowth - the amount to increase daily growth rate
      See Also:
      checkReadyToHarvest()

    • checkReadyToHarvest

      public void checkReadyToHarvest()
      Checks if currentGrowth is greater than 100. If so set current growth to 100 Checks if currentGrowth is equal to 100. If so change isHarvestable to true

    • changeCurrentGrowth

      public void changeCurrentGrowth​(int amount)
      Changes current growth, then calls checkReadyToHarvest.

      See Also:
